text: The large-billed crow (Corvus macrorhynchos) is a type of crow found in East Asia. Sometimes people think that this bird is a raven. This crow is of least concern so it is safe. It is also called the jungle crow. The bird was called a 'gorilla crow' in Japan, this is because people said it looked like one when they were looking at it. ==References== Category:Corvids Category:Birds of Asia
title: Large-billed crow
